org.svvrl.goal.core.aut.fsa

Class Determinization

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.svvrl.goal.core.aut.fsa.Determinization

  • public class Determinization
extends java.lang.Object
    This class collects several methods for the determinization of a finite state automaton.
    Author:
    Ming-Hsien Tsai

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static java.lang.String NBW2DBWAlgorithmKey
      The option key of the algorithm applied in the conversion from NBW to DBW.
      static java.lang.String NBW2DBWBK09
      The key of the BK09 algorithm.
      static java.lang.String NBW2DBWLandweber
      The key of the Landweber algorithm.

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static FSA toDBWByBK09(FSA aut)
      Determinizes an FSA to an equivalent DBW through DCW by the approach in [BK09].

      Determinizes an FSA to an equivalent DBW through DMW by the approach in [Lan69].

      Determinizes an NFW to an equivalent DFW.

      Determinizes an NBW to an equivalent DPW by Safra-Piterman construction with default options.

      Determinizes an NBW to an equivalent DPW by Safra-Piterman construction with custom options.

      Determinizes an NBW to an equivalent DRW by the modified Safra's construction with default options.

      Determinizes an NBW to an equivalent DRW by the modified Safra's construction with custom options.

      • toDBWByLandweber

        public static FSA toDBWByLandweber(FSA aut)
                            throws UnsupportedException
        Determinizes an FSA to an equivalent DBW through DMW by the approach in [Lan69].
        Parameters:
        aut - a finite state automaton
        Returns:
        a DBW equivalent to aut
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the automaton aut is not convertible to an equivalent NBW
        UnsupportedException - if any intermediate conversion is not supported or the source automaton is not equivalent to any DBW
        See Also:
        FSA2DBWByLandweber

      • toDBWByBK09

        public static FSA toDBWByBK09(FSA aut)
                       throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException,
                              UnsupportedException
        Determinizes an FSA to an equivalent DBW through DCW by the approach in [BK09].
        Parameters:
        aut - a finite state automaton convertible to an equivalent NBW
        Returns:
        a DBW equivalent to aut
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the automaton aut is not convertible to an equivalent NBW
        UnsupportedException - if any intermediate conversion is not supported or the source automaton is not equivalent to any DBW
        See Also:
        FSA2DBWByBK09
